attributes.action: Stop online inflated prices and bulk buying of baby products etc
attributes.additional_details: Just look on eBay and Amazon.  It’s all very evident people are being exploited in desperate times.
attributes.background: The government needs to stop people making money from over inflated selling of essential daily products.  Especially online platforms such as eBay and Amazon.  Either stop them or cap them.  Make all online/supermarkets limit purchases  of essentials such as baby formula etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
